data.title: Miss New York USA and Miss New York Teen USA
data.meta_description: The next Miss New York USA or Miss New York Teen USA could be you! This once in a lifetime opportunity is waiting for you! Apply today!
data.meta_site_name: MISS NEW YORK USA and MISS NEW YORK TEEN USA
data.text:
Are you ready to make your dreams a reality?

MISS USA is now open to all ages!

Qualify for the prestigious MISS USA® Pageant and MISS TEEN USA® Pageant to be held in Hollywood CA, by competing in Miss New York USA® or Miss New York Teen USA®!

The 2024 Titleholders will jet off to Los Angeles this summer…pack your bags!

Begin your journey to the 2024 New York State Preliminary to MISS USA® and MISS TEEN USA® to be held June 28 – 30, 2024

NO EXPERIENCE IS NECESSARY! There are no height or weight requirements. We are looking for outgoing women, who are beautiful on the inside and out, who can use the title of Miss New York USA® or Miss New York Teen USA® to make a difference. Our organization provides a unique opportunity for young woman to meet peers with similar goals and ambitions to form a support system that empowers them to succeed. Our program is designed to be an excellent vehicle for advancing your career and personal goals, the contestants receive guidance on public speaking, personal appearance and physical fitness to name a few. In addition, the winners and top finalists, will receive thousands in cash, prizes, awards and scholarships.

Some of Hollywood’s most successful talent including Halle Berry, Eva Longoria, Giuliana Rancic, Vanessa Minnillo, Maria Menounos, Ali Landry, Shelley Hennig and Olivia Culpo got their start competing in the MISS USA® pageant. We look forward to getting to know you by completing the application below!

Once we have received your information and photo, you will be interviewed by telephone. Following this interview, the selection committee will consider your application and you will be notified by e-mail at info@missnewyorkusa.com if chosen. We cannot extend invitations to everyone who applies, and we thank you for your understanding.

If you do not hear from us within 2 weeks of submitting your entry below, please email us at: info@missnewyorkusa.com.

The next Miss New York USA | Miss New York Teen USA could be you!
